page.title: 19Gilmerton Industries.
page.content: Near the old pit-head at {Gilmerton, {Bernard Hunter }has a large scrap yard.Old vehicles,including buses form the bulk of the scrap. Also near the pit-head is {Eddison {Plant Hire}a firm which hires out heavy machinery to contractors.Another similar firm is {Stewart Plant Hire. {Kings }a subsidiary of {Tarmac}also have prmises in Gilmerton.This firm lays road surfaces and uses sand and gravel from the {Melville Sand and {Gravel Pit}at 298665. {Jackson}the baker recently closed their large bakery in Gilmerton due to repeated break-ins and acts of vandalism.The firm still has a small shop in the village.
